UpdateLog.description:
<title>Notes</title><font>Small</font>
<title>Bug Fixes</title><font>Tiny</font> - Fixed bug where biome costs would add additional costs for hills and winter costs from vanilla on top of adding vehicle related costs, essentially doubling the effect of hills and winter for vehicles.
- Fixed bug where saving a vehicle while in the landing / takeoff animation would incorrectly serialize the vehicle + pawns, resulting in a save / load issue.
- Fixed bug where hitboxes for even size vehicles wouldn't rotate properly, resulting in hits from very specific directions immediately damaging internal parts. <title>Performance Changes</title><font>Tiny</font>
<title>Compatibility Fixes</title><font>Tiny</font> - Map Preview
<title>Additional Changes</title><font>Tiny</font> - Internal parts can now be given hitboxes. They will be prioritized when taking penetrating damage at that cell, otherwise it will select a random internal part like before.
- Added turret offsets to 'Tweak Fields' editor window. <title>Final Notes</title><font>Tiny</font> Please report any issues you find on the <link>https://discord.gg/zXDyfWQ</link>(discord server).
